Functions

complex double zcoulomb (complex double z)
complex double dzcoulomb (complex double z)

Detailed Description

calculates 1/sqrt(z) erf(sqrt(z)) for complex z using a pade approximation

(c) 2003 Thomas Neff

Definition in file coulomb.h.
